title: DBMS Level 9 — Normalization & Functional Dependencies
intro: This level teaches normalization to reduce redundancy and anomalies.
points: Understand the need for normalization (update, insert, delete anomalies).
Concept of functional dependency (FD) X → Y.
First Normal Form (1NF) — no repeating groups, atomic attributes.
Second Normal Form (2NF) — 1NF + no partial dependency on candidate key.
Third Normal Form (3NF) — 2NF + no transitive dependency on candidate key.
